Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

Inventory_Quick_Issue_Line_Data.description: Reference of the Unit Of Measure for the Issuing Inventory Item

validation.validation: Unit of measure [uom] is not valid for item [item].

The Unit of Measure is not a valid Stocking Issue Unit of Measure for the item.  The UOM must be in the list of valid Issue UOMs for the Site if defined, or a Stocking UOM for the Item if Issue UOMs are not defined at the Site.

validation.validation: The Lot ID is required for lot-controlled items.
A lot id can't be assigned to an item which is not lot-controlled.
Item: [itemname]. Lot: [lotdescription] is expired. Expiration Date: [lotexpirationdate].

Inventory_Quick_Issue_Line_Data.description: The quantity of the Inventory item being issued

validation.validation: Quantity cannot be negative
Must enter a whole number for the Issue Quantity for Serial-Control Item.

The quantity requested can't be issued. The requested quantity ([issue qty] [base uom]) is greater than the quantity not yet reserved ([available qty] [base uom]). Change the issue quantity or unreserve.
The Quantity must convert into a valid whole number in Base UOM.
The Quantity must be a whole number for the UOM.
Location [loc] is currently not available for issue
Insufficient quantity to issue (Available: [available] Total Requested: [req])
Serial Number cannot be blank.

Inventory_Quick_Issue_Line_Data.description: Reference to existing worktags. Worktags are a way to mark tasks and business objects to make them easier to access and summarize.  Each transaction can include one value for each worktag type and is subject to configurable validation when submitted for approval.

validation.validation: [not allowed worktag types on Inventory web service transactions]
'[worktag value]' is not permitted as the default value for worktag type: [worktag type] because it is inactive.
[invalid worktag value message]
The [type] is/are not available for use with the company/s: [partitionable] [company]
Enter a company that matches on the award line in effect for grant: [grant]. This company doesn't match the grant on the award line: [comp].
[missing required worktag types on Inventory web service transactions]
